actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to give the Civil Aeronautics Board the flexibility to approve air carrier-surface carrier control relationships when such relationships are found to be in the public interest.

summary.text: Empowers, under the Federal Aviation Act, the Civil Aeronautics Board to approve air carrier-surface carrier control relationships when such relationships are found to be in the public interest.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Federal Aviation Act of 1958 to give the Civil Aeronautics Board the flexibility to approve air carrier-surface carrier control relationships when such relationships are found to be in the public interest.
